issue.title: Implement a service request from the command line using "ign"

content.raw: Your compilation problem is expected. In the case of topics, `Publish()` accepts a pointer to a `google::protobuf::Message`, which is the base class of any protobuf message and the returned type of `ignition::msgs::Factory::New()`. On the other hand, `Request()` requires the specific type and that's why you see the error. I didn't predict this problem and it'll probably require some changes in the code.
content.html: Your compilation problem is expected. In the case of topics, Publish() accepts a pointer to a google::protobuf::Message, which is the base class of any protobuf message and the returned type of ignition::msgs::Factory::New(). On the other hand, Request() requires the specific type and that's why you see the error. I didn't predict this problem and it'll probably require some changes in the code.
